title: Enhancing Patient Care Practice Competencies: Online Intensive Workshop on Business Interpretation and Translation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will perform basic consecutive/simultaneous interpretation in business meeting scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Learners will achieve over 75% contextual accuracy when translating practical documents (e.g., contracts, emails) into the target language.
Learners will apply at least three business communication strategies considering cultural differences through VR simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
